title: Python Developer
jobDescription: Develop and maintain Python-based applications for data engineering and machine learning purposes.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable solutions for data processing and analysis.
Implement and optimize pyspark code for efficient distributed data processing.
Utilize NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB, for data storage and retrieval in large-scale applications.
Design and implement real-time streaming solutions for data ingestion and processing.
Deploy and manage applications in Kubernetes environments, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance.
Design, build, and deploy machine learning pipelines, incorporating best practices for model training, evaluation, and deployment.
Utilize Delta Live Tables for managing data changes and versioning in data lake environments.
Work closely with DevOps teams to automate deployment processes using Azure DevOps and other CI/CD tools.
Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends in data engineering, machine learning, and cloud computing.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
Strong proficiency in Python programming language and Pyspark Coding.
Experience with distributed data processing frameworks such as pyspark.
Hands-on experience with NoSQL databases, particularly MongoDB.
Familiarity with real-time streaming technologies and frameworks.
Experience deploying and managing applications in Kubernetes environments.
Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker.
Experience designing and deploying machine learning pipelines.
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as Azure.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.

title: Python Developer (internship)
jobDescription: Maintain and develop the backend of a recruitment platform based on the Django Rest Framework
Write unit tests for new functionalities
Deliver readable and transparent code
Build dashboards based on SQL queries and process the results
Have direct contact with the client
Enthusiasm for learning and an open mind
Knowledge of Python/Django and an interest in AI/LLM
Candidates ready to work from our office in Gliwice
